alert.note: Alert for Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wakulla and southeastern Liberty Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 405 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles south of Greensboro, or 20 miles southeast of Blountstown, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Poplar Camp and Smith Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
